.. _changelog:

Changelog
=========

Versions follow `Semantic Versioning <http://www.semver.org>`_

`1.1.0`_ - 2022-03-10
---------------------

Added
~~~~~
* Added support for Python 3.10.
* Added :attr:`__version__` variable to package.

.. _1.1.0: https://github.com/mdomke/python-ulid/compare/1.0.3...1.1.0
